Name: loudoun_2008_ctproads_point
LayerDisplayName: County Transportation Planned Roads, Loudoun County, VA (2001)
Originator: Loudoun County, VA, Office of Transportation Services
OriginatorSort: Loudoun County, VA, Office of Transportation Services
Abstract: This feature class includes existing and planned alignments, functional classification, planned interchanges, scenic byways and ultimate roadway geometry for all of Loudoun County. Please note that the planned roadway alignments shown are conceptual and are subject to further engineering.   Loudoun County recognizes the importance of roadway planning by including existing and planned roadway alignments as a map element of the Revised County wide Transportation Plan adopted on July 23, 2001.

<metadata>
  <idinfo>
    <citation>

      <ftname Sync="TRUE">loudoun_2008_ctproads_point</ftname>
</citeinfo>
    </citation>
    <descript>
      <abstract>This feature class includes existing and planned alignments, functional classification, planned interchanges, scenic byways and ultimate roadway geometry for all of Loudoun County. Please note that the planned roadway alignments shown are conceptual and are subject to further engineering.   Loudoun County recognizes the importance of roadway planning by including existing and planned roadway alignments as a map element of the Revised County wide Transportation Plan adopted on July 23, 2001.</abstract>
      <purpose>The purpose of this data set is allow reproduction of the official CTP map(s), or sub-area maps for use by County elected officials, County staff and the general public. This data cannot be changed or modified without going through the appropriate Loudoun County CPAM procedure with Board approval.</purpose>
      <supplinf>This layer's alignment follows street centerline and identifies the special designations of planned and existing roadways in Transportation Plan.
Data are stored in the corporate ArcSDE Geodatabase as a point feature class.  The coordinate system is Virginia State Plane (North), Zone 4501, datum NAD83 HARN (vertical datum, if applicable, NAVD88), US Survey foot units.</supplinf>
    </descript>

      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Existing and planned roadway alignments as identified by 2001 Revised Countywide Transportation Plan extracted from centerlines layer.</procdesc>
        <procdate>2001</procdate>
        <proccont>

      <procstep>
        <procdesc>This data set was part of a batch process that converted legacy data from ArcInfo coverage in Librarian to a single-tiled ArcInfo coverage in preparation for a final coversion to ArcSDE Geodatabase Feature Classes. Data were extracted from Librarian using the EXTRACT TOPOLOGICAL command.

Multi-tiled data sets were extracted into multiple coverages and then combined based on the feature type(s). Layers with both polygon and arc feature classes were processed with the Arc commands, MAPJOIN and DISSOLVE. Arc feature classes alone were processed with the Arc commands, APPEND and DISSOLVE. Layers with both arc and point feature classes and point feature classes alone were processed with the Arc command, APPEND.  When used, the Arc command, DISSOLVE, was given with the <#all> option.

All coverages were then reprojected to HARN 83 using the following .prj file specifications: 
INPUT
PROJECTION STATEPLANE
UNITS FEET
ZONE 5551
DATUM NAD27 NADCON
PARAMETERS
OUTPUT
PROJECTION STATEPLANE
UNITS FEET
FIPSZONE 4501
DATUM HPGN NADCON
PARAMETERS END
			   
This dataset was then converted to a feature class in a geodatabase in ArcSDE.</procdesc>
        <procdate>2004</procdate>
        <proccont>
          <cntinfo>
            <cntorgp>

            <cntaddr>
              <addrtype/>
              <address/>
              <city/>
              <state/>
              <postal/>
            </cntaddr>
            <cntvoice/>
          </cntinfo>
        </proccont>
      </procstep>

      </procstep>
